Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate tere raba ne hukama kara dita hai, ki tu usa tom binham kise hora di badagi na kara, mata pita nala caga vihara kara. Jekara uha tere sahamane budhepe vica pahuca jana tam unham vicom ika jam dovam nu ufa taka na kahi ate na unham nu jhiraka. Unham nala izata nala gala kara
Ate unham de sahamane nimarata puravaka pi'ara di'am baham phaila do. Ate akho, ki he palanahara! Inham covam upara rahima kara. Jivem inham ne (rahimata kara ke) bacapana vica mainu pali'a
Tuhada raba cagi tar'ham janada hai ki tuhade dilam vica ki hai. Jekara tusim neka rahoge tam uha tauba karana vali'am nu mu'afa kara dena vala hai
Ate risatedaram nu, niradhana nu ate musaphiram nu unham da haka de devom ate phazula kharaci na karo
Besaka phazula kharaci karana vale saitana de bhara hana ate saitana apane raba da behada na sukara hai
Ate jekara tuhanu apane raba di kirapa, jisa di tusim icha karade ho, di udika vica ho ate unham tom bacana pave tam unham nala nimarata puravaka gala karom
Ate natam apana hatha gale nala banha lavem ate na hi usa nu pura khul'ha chada devem. Tusim mazabura ate kamazora bana ke na rahi ja'u
Besaka tera raba jisa nu cahuda hai, zi'ada rizaka pradana karada hai ate jisanu cahuda hai simata kara dida hai. Yakinana uha apane badi'am di khabara rakhana vala ate vekhana vala hai
Ate apani satana di kagali de dara nala hati'a na karo, asim unham nu vi rizaka dide ham ate tuhanu vi. Besaka unham di hati'a karana bahuta vada papa hai
Ate vibhacara (zina) de nere na ja'u iha asalilata ate putha raha hai

Ate jisa janavara nu alaha ne sanamana vala bana'i'a hai. Usa di hati'a na karom, para inasafa la'i (ko'i haraza nahim) ate jisa bade di ani'am puravaka hati'a ho jave tam asim usa de varisam nu (khuna de badale da) adhikara dita hai. Uha hati'a vica hadam da ulaghana na karana usa di madada kiti jave

Ate tusim yatima di daulata de nere na javo para iha yoga hove. Ithom taka ki uha apani javani di avasatha nu pahuca jana. Va'ade nu pura karo. Besaka va'ade di puta paratala (ki'amata de dina) kadara hovegi
Ate jadom napa ke devo tam pura napo ate thika kadhe (takari) nala tola ke dovo. Iha bihatara tarika hai ate isa da natija vi caga hai
Ate ajihi ciza de piche na lago, jisa da tuhanu gi'ana nahim. Besaka kana, akham ate dila sari'am di manukha tom paratala hovegi
Ate dharati upara akara ke na calo. Tusim dharati nu para nahim sakade. Na tusim paharam di'am uza'i'am taka pahuca sakade ho
Iha sare bure kama tere raba nu pasada nahi hana

Iha uha galam hana jihari'am tuhade raba ne hikamata di'am gahari'i'am vicom (neki karana) tuhade vala vahi (sadesa da rupa) du'ara bheji'am hana. Ate alaha de barabara ko'i hora pujanayoga na bana'una, nahim tam tusim nidaka ate phitakare ho'e bana ke naraka vica bheja dite javoge
Ki tuhade raba ne tuhanu bete cuna ke dite ate apane la'i farisati'am vicom beti'am bana la'i'am. Besaka tusim behada sakhata gala karade haim
Ate isa kura'ana vica bhina-bhina tar'ham nala bi'ana kita hai, tam ki uha isa da palana karana. Para inham di bemukhata vadhadi hi jandi hai
Akho, ki jekara alaha de barasara hora vi pujanayoga hude, jivem ki loka akhade hana, tam uha sighasana vale vala zarura raha kadhade
Alaha paka ate sresata hai. Usa tom jihara iha loka kahide hana

Sate asamana ate dharati ate inham vica jau vi hai, sare hi usa di pavitarata ta varanana karade hana. Ate kau'i ciza vi ajihi nahim jihari prasanata de nala usa di pavitarata da bi'ana na karadi hove. Para tusim usa di upama nu nahim samajhade. Nirasadeha uha baradasata karana vala ate mu'afa karana vala hai
Ate jadom' tusim kura'ana parade ho tam asim' tuhade ate unham lokam de vicakara ika gupata parada pa dide ham, jihare asirata nu nahim manade

Ate asim unham de dilam te parada pa dide ham ki uha usa nu na samajhana, ate unham de kanam nu bole kara dide ham. Ate jadom tusim kura'ana vica ikala apane raba da zikara karade ho, tam uha nafarata nala apani pitha phera lainde hana

Ate asim janade ham ki jadom uha tuhade vala kana la'unde hana tam uha kisa la'i sunade hana, jadom ki uha apisa vica kanaphusi (cugali) karade hana. Iha zalima akhade hana ki tusim loka tam sasa ika jadugara bade de piche cala rahe ho
Dekho, uha tuhade la'i uha kiho jihi'am hujatam ghara rahe hana. Iha loka gramaraha ho ga'e hana ate iha raha nahim pa sakade
Ate uha akhade hana ki jadom asim hadi ate zura bana javange tam ki asim phira navem sire tom cuke javange
